item.title: Purchasing A Domain
item.description: Watch as the mysteries of the website is uncovered in this video. I will show you what is the best place to purchase domain and the pro and cons of it.

item.title: Why Use A Static Site Generator
item.description: In my series of building a site for 12$ we are going to talk about our website design and why you would choose a static site generator instead of something dynamic or just static.

item.title: Wanna Build a Website for 12 Dollars???
item.description: That’s right. You read that right. Today I am going to talk about why you wanna build a portfolio site and in the future videos we are going to talk about how to do so for only $12 a year.

item.title: Lists
item.description: Today we go over Lists in python and some built in functions and how they apply to them.

item.title: Strings
item.description: Today we look at what strings are and how we create them in python.

item.title: Boolean
item.description: Today we go over briefly what a boolean is

item.title: Data Types
item.description: Today I’m briefly going over what data types and a couple of the build in native python datatypes.

item.title: Installing The IDE
item.description: Today we are learning how to install the integrated development environment and how to link python to it.

item.title: Installing Python
item.description: Today we learn how to install python and then run a line of code to make sure that it has installed correctly.

item.title: Setup VS Code with Python on Mac
item.description: I am going to show you how to setup Python and Visual Studio Code on macOS :)
